The collapsible design allows for easy storage when not in use, maximizing space efficiency in the nursery.

data.product: Personalised Children's Book, A Promise To You
data.description:
A beautifully illustrated personalised book filled with love and promises to give to a child close to you to show them how much they mean to you. 

This delightful book is filled with wonderful promises to help and guide a child through their lives. It can be from one or two people and is personalised with your name and the child’s name. A truly special book to be treasured for a lifetime.

The words:
I/We promise you a warm and safe place in my/our home, and hearts. I/We promise to always have time for you... To talk to you and listen to you. To sing with you and dance with you. I/We will show you how wonderful your world is... we are going to have so much fun!

I/We promise to learn about the things you love, so I/we can love them too. I/we promise to always have a cuddle – and a smile for you. I/we may not be able to reach up and grab you a star, but I/we will be by your side to look at them together. I/we promise to help you pursue your dreams... and help you grow to be strong and happy and free. I/we promise to encourage you to follow your own path. I/we will share my/our knowledge with you... and learn from you. I/we may not always be able to stop you getting hurt – but I/we promise to always do my/our best to make you feel better.

And my/our biggest promise to you is that I/we will be there for you, whenever you need me/us, day or night. All our/my love...

Made from high quality paper and binding.

Dimensions: 210mm x 210mm, 32 pages.

data.description:
A light to enlighten the night with the stars above that moment that changed your life forever. The night you said "I do" or saw that little face for the first time. We make beautiful star map night lights showing the unique alignment of the stars in a place and time chosen by you. Birthday, engagement, wedding, when you first kissed...Besides choosing the design, you can completely personalize your star light by adding your own title and footnote. Each night light is unique and made on-demand, just for you. 

Given a location (e.g. a city), a date and time of the day, we can calculate the exact celestial location of all the stars and constellations in that very moment, using astronomical algorithms. We then project these onto a map and engrave it for you and make a beautiful night light so that it serves as a memento of your special moment. For example, first dates, wedding days, birthdays or passed loved ones.

- Size: 18 cm / 4.5 inches wide - 20 cm / 7.5 inches high - (including the wood base)
- LED's life span - 50.000 hours
- Works plugged-in
- It has no on/off button.
- Wall charger is NOT included. Any usb charger will work just fine.

uniqueAttributes.Customizable: You can completely personalize your star light by adding your own title and footnote.
uniqueAttributes.Unique moment: The night light shows the unique alignment of the stars in a place and time chosen by you. This makes it a special and meaningful gift that captures a special moment in time.
uniqueAttributes.Astronomical accuracy: The star maps are created using astronomical algorithms to calculate the exact celestial location of all the stars and constellations in that very moment. This ensures that the star map is accurate and represents the night sky as it appeared at that specific time and place.
uniqueAttributes.Thoughtful gift: The star map night light is a thoughtful and unique gift that is perfect for anniversaries, birthdays, weddings, or any other special occasion.

data.description:
Celebrate your love and commitment with our Anniversary Candle, the perfect gift for any kind of anniversary! Whether you're searching for a special first anniversary gift or commemorating a 50th year of marriage, this candle is a thoughtful and sentimental gesture that will surely be cherished. This personalized candle makes an excellent gift for your husband or wife, friend, or parents, expressing your love and gratitude for all the years spent together.

Our candles are hand poured in our studio in Tennessee. We use a natural soy coconut wax blend, premium phthalate-free fragrance infused with essential oils, and cotton wicks. Our soy coconut wax is a sustainable alternative to paraffin that burns evenly and binds beautifully with our toxin-free fragrances to produce a rich, enduring scent.

Each candle comes in a muslin bag and then placed inside a white branded box before it is packaged for shipping. Our branded box is included in the listing price. Please see the listing photos for more specifics on how your candle will arrive.

FROSTED CANDLE VESSEL
-Coconut Soy Wax
-Phthalate Free Fragrance
-40-45 Hour Burn Time
-230g/8oz weight
-Cotton Wick
-Includes Bamboo Lid
-3.75in x 3.15in (with lid)
-Comes in 4x4x4 Branded Box

data.description: Handmade in the studio of designer-maker Noa Razer in Tel Aviv, Israel, this hanging lampshade is part of the Apilar collection, inspired by Spanish ceramics. The unique design features nine different ceramic shapes stacked on top of each other to create complex compositions with vibrant colors. The lampshade is adorned with ceramic prints inspired by traditions from different cultures, resulting in a contemporary cultural collage. The designer's ongoing research into traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and search for a sense of belonging through local material culture is evident in this piece.

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel.
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.
uniqueAttributes.Cultural inspiration: On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.
uniqueAttributes.Research and innovation: The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

data.description: Handmade in Tel Aviv, this unique ceramic lamp combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top. It measures 7.9-inch \ 24 cm in height (without the bulb) and 7.9-inch \ 20 cm in diameter. The lamp comes with 60 inches \ 150 cm golden textile cable and a terracotta 4-inch \ 10 cm ceiling rose. It is suitable for standard E27 bulb, Voltage 110V-250V | 25 to 40W max. Energy-saving LED light bulbs are recommended. Note that the bulb is not included. This product is made to order by hand so that it may be slightly different from the one in the photo. Please allow 1-2 weeks production time before shipping. This object can be ordered in various colors and prints. This piece is part of the Apilar collection, inspired by Spanish ceramics and featuring nine different shapes that can be stacked together to create a variety of designs.

This offers a level of creativity and customization that is not found in most generic lamps.

uniqueAttributes.Versatile: The lamp can be used in various settings, from cozy living rooms to minimalist spaces, and can be ordered in different colors and prints to suit individual preferences. This versatility sets it apart from generic lamps that may have a limited range of options.
